summary: "I will kill 50 people in your family and rape ten women in your family. Less than this, the oath is not for people." Xia Xueyi
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][/center][center][b]﻿[size=5]Golden Snake Sword[/size]
[i][size=3]model: Highland Park[/size][/i]
[/b]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92625/92625-1532104094-2005895463.jpeg[/img]﻿

When Xia Xueyi was young, the gangsters who smuggled adultery and gangsters, Wen Fanglu, raped him, and killed his parents and his brothers. Xia Xueyi was the only survivor of the family, and he vowed to avenge revenge. After Xia Xueyi grew up, he became a handsome man with a handsome appearance, and he did not know where to learn to become a martial art.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92625/92625-1532103993-1378257599.jpeg[/img]﻿

Xia Xueyi, who deceived the Golden Snake Sword, created the "Golden Snake Swordsmanship" according to the unique appearance and characteristics of the Golden Snake Sword. After returning to the Central Plains, the Golden Snake Sword method was matched with the Golden Snake Sword and the rivers and lakes were unmatched, winning the name of "Golden Snake Langjun". The martial arts of the top and the personality of the haze, Xia Xueyi became the demon-level character of the people in the rivers and lakes.

[b][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92625/92625-1532104110-409479370.jpeg[/img][/b]

After the fame, he went to Wen’s house to start revenge. First, he killed the great enemy Wen Fanglu and left to Wen Jiabao, "I will kill 50 people in your family and rape ten women in your family. Less than this, the oath is not for people." .

[size=6][b]Create Credit[/b][/size]
